title: [NEW] Having issues Patching 6.9? Click Here!
body:
Hey all,

The ye ol' Mid Season Mage Update is upon us. Ready your spells, wands, and whatever that adorable void creature is for battle in the Rift. The age of the Mage is here! 

http://i.imgur.com/SFfQCll.jpg

If your client is unruly and saying, "You shall not patch!" We have some incantations that can solve your dilemma below. 

----------------------------------------------

>#***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scan already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

> #***Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!

>#***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body: I just don't get how after so many years and so many billions of dollars of revenue, you can still only provide the terrible client we have today. There is no reason that every time you release a patch, I have to leave my client open for HOURS just scanning files, before it can even BEGIN to download the patch... It's honestly ridiculous, and you should be embarrassed with your cookie cutter "it's best to just let it finish scanning for corrupt files for 5 hours" response, like that's a normal burden players should have to endure every patch...

> [{quoted}](name=R4ther,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=VIelnu0R,comment-id=002d,timestamp=2016-05-05T00:28:31.275+0000)
>
> I just don't get how after so many years and so many billions of dollars of revenue, you can still only provide the terrible client we have today. There is no reason that every time you release a patch, I have to leave my client open for HOURS just scanning files, before it can even BEGIN to download the patch... It's honestly ridiculous, and you should be embarrassed with your cookie cutter "it's best to just let it finish scanning for corrupt files for 5 hours" response, like that's a normal burden players should have to endure every patch...

Until this patch I've never had any issues so it's definitely a user issue not theirs.
So because you have never had this particular issue before, one individual person, I am supposed to believe that the many others saying the same thing on this post must have "user issues"? OK

> [{quoted}](name=R4ther,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=VIelnu0R,comment-id=002d00000000,timestamp=2016-05-05T01:22:06.347+0000)
>
> So because you have never had this particular issue, one individual person, I am supposed to believe that the many others saying the same thing on this post must have "user issues"? OK

No I'm saying if it was a client issue, everyone would have the problem because we all download the same files. So it has to be a reaction with something in people's computers, or how the computer downloads files, not an issue with the client itself.

Thats total crap and you know it. So what you're saying is if there is an issue everyone should be getting it? This isn't consoles. Everyone has different computers. The chances of me, you, and OP having the same computer is as astronomical as pluto becoming a planet again. And yes, I have been having serious issues with the client and i know it's not a "user issue" it's a client issue. People have been having issues with this terrible client for years now. "User issue" is not an excuse and Riot should feel embarrassed with their client.

> [{quoted}](name=EHPBLuurr,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=VIelnu0R,comment-id=002d0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-05T05:22:58.318+0000)
>
> Thats total crap and you know it. So what you're saying is if there is an issue everyone should be getting it? This isn't consoles. Everyone has different computers. The chances of me, you, and OP having the same computer is as astronomical as pluto becoming a planet again. And yes, I have been having serious issues with the client and i know it's not a "user issue" it's a client issue. People have been having issues with this terrible client for years now. "User issue" is not an excuse and Riot should feel embarrassed with their client.

What? That doesn't make sense, if their client is what's wrong, everyone would have issues. It doesn't matter if I use Vista,  or windows 10 or play on a mac or a Linux,  if the issue was the client itself,  EVERYONE would have issues. If the client wasn't replacing files on my computer properly and it was causing errors, but it updated just fine for others, then the variable is the computer, not their client.

I'm having the same problem so it's not a user issue. Between the endless file scanning, and having to change my resolution every time I want to start a game because the client ultra zooms in on itself and cuts off half the screen, I've given up on this game. I have a brand new computer out of the box and I've had no problems downloading steam games. Only this game. Its sad too because its a good game when it works right but its too much of a hassle to get it to work properly. They need to fix it. It's 2016 not 1997. These problems shouldn't exist anymore.
"... is as astronomical as pluto becoming a planet again." just died a little xD

I know LunaFox already responded to you, but I did want to touch on your comment about the current client.  Straight up, we know how much better the current client can be.  This is why we [have announced](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update) an updated client and are providing consistent updates about it.  We want players to have the best experience as possible, and have dedicated an insane amount of resources to getting this update to everyone as quick as possible.

Keep an eye out for more info in the future!

so if you're working on it and people are having the same issue, my question is how long is it going to take? Give me an estimate, I am about to wipe my hard drive and reinstall everything if it doesn't work I am probably done with this game. I didn't have these issues until 6.9 came out. This build is only a couple months old if that so there is ZERO reason why I should be having issues.

If you are so smart, why dont you create a 100% working patch for them that never has issues, never is overflowed with users, not like LOL is the one of the most played game in the world. Never has internet issues problem.... yea, do that. And then we can all agree you were right
Having trouble with the new patch getting disconnected frequently, anyone else having this same problem? Would be greatly appreciated if you guys could fix this problem thank you!

Alright, I'll be on a bit later, tell me if you figure something out.

Heya! Are you getting any sort of error when you're patching? Can you describe what you see that makes it seem like the patcher has disconnected, and around what percent this happens? That would be great info for me!

I know that my connection is fine because i can play other games and watch movies with ease, however when i try to go past the error it takes me back to the client with the reconnect button beneath a message saying that i have crashed.
Add me "TheRisingKing" and we can solve the problem together.
server unavailable?
So right after this patch since last week whenever i click on launch the log in screen doesnt open up ive tried all the things riot has told me to do but none of them works please help

This has begun to happen to me, I opened a ticket in support just a bit ago after trying all the usual troubleshooting. 
Is there anything outside the ordinary they had you try?

i cant loge in in my account after the new patch  it says  the login server didnot respond and i may have a connection issue but i am connecting to my enternet and its good i try open youtube and other webs all works but when try to login i cant why(sorry for my bad english)

EUNE in specific is currently having login issues. You can[ follow the status updates](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune) for more information. Once the notice is removed you should be able to connect. If you can't, just reply here and we'll work through it!
Well, I don't have time for this waiting. Please add 230 IP to my account, and reset the first win IP timer, and I'll call it a day.
he belongs to NA server D...

"Why does league scan so many files?"

I opened the patcher, checked the patch notes, tried to close the patch notes in the patcher but mistakely closed the patcher. Now I have to wait till it finally finishes scanning files. 

Oh and by the way i'd like to know why rito doesn't implement a system where you download the new patch, and once the patching is done, you can delete the old patching files which aren't being used. Because if you've been playing since season 1 and haven't reinstalled since then, you'd probably reach over 70K-90K files easily because of not deleting the old patching folders.

Is there a way to manually do it? That way it can save disk space and we won't have to wait an hour or more for every patch.

That's a good insight! If you look in your game folder, you will find that it may be scanning more files than even exist in the folder! The reason for this is that when it fixes a corrupt file, it will re-scan. This raises the file count visually. When players are going upwards of 20-30k files scanned, that means that their install is corrupted and it's having to fix a lot of files. If it's a reoccurring issue each patch, then something is causing those files to corrupt after they've been made healthy. It's usually a permissions/anti-virus or hardware problem.

That's there too :) But doesn't it scan every file in league folder? If it does then people who haven't reinstalled the game for 3-4 years will have a really huge file. I've seen forums on reddit where people hit 70K files easily. Or it could be because of custom skins if they use.

It does scan them all yes, but they have all the same files as someone who just reinstalled. If they've missed out on a lot of patches because they haven't played in a long time then they may have a large download. The reason you see it going up to 70k works kind of like this...

Patcher scans 10 files
Patcher fixes 1 file and then begins to rescan them again.
Patcher tells you it has scanned 20 files, even though there are only 10 because it had to scan the same ones twice.

It may seem kind of tedious, but it helps to keep all the files healthy and the game crash free. That being said, we are looking at ways to improve the patching process and the client! :)
Ummm Layout Is Supposed to updated with patch right? my champs and game are updated except layout???
It's not updated yet and I don't have an ETA at the moment, hopefully we'll be seeing that update roll through soon!

when im on the patcher not all of the boxes appear apart from "patch notes 6.9" which is slightly cut off, also its scanning quite a lot of files finally the first time i tried to update it it got stuck on 32% stage 1. {{item:3070}}

UPDATE #1: stopped scanning files, now appliying patches

Hey FreshieKing! Getting stuck at 32% signifies that there are issues with your permissions, or your game data is corrupt. Your OS may be blocking files from being downloaded, which is why it's not making progress on the patcher. If you work through the [Patching Guide](http://riot.com/1Bm1U4c) it has a lot of useful steps to solve this and get you back up to speed! If you're still stuck after that, just reply here and I'll be happy to help!

This is absolutely friggin ridiculous Riot. I have have been waiting  3+ hours to play league but the files keep reaching up to 6000+  and they just wont stop. You say to let it do it's thing. hell no that will take centuries... seriously fix your sht

It is best to let the Patcher scan all the files, but if your client is reaching over 50,000 there is an issue. When your client patches it looks for corrupt files and makes sure that everything is up to date. 

If you're still having issues with Patching I would suggest running through this [Patching Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434). This will also be helpful if you have issues in the future when patching up the game.

And i'm on a mac as well, so it's a bit troublesome
This is unacceptable. I'm stuck at 33% endlessly scanning files, and when I hit the repair button, I'm at zero percent scanning files. It's about to drive me {{champion:222}}
does anyone else get the error that the PVP client just fails to run basically? I don't even get to download the patch updates.
I am at over 26k file scanned, is this suppose to be happening?
It's best to let it continue to scan. At this point its fixing corrupted files so that you don't have issues while you're in the game. If it gets over 50K though reach back out to me.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldPikaKnight,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=VIelnu0R,comment-id=00120000,timestamp=2016-05-04T21:29:38.819+0000)

> It's best to let it continue to scan. At this point its fixing corrupted files so that you don't have issues while you're in the game. If it gets over 50K though reach back out to me.

I forgot to get back to you but the number of files scanned was 83757. I know this because i was super salty and spammed my friends in skype about it. I listened, and it worked. But just forgot to get ack to you. How can I fix it so next time it doesn't happen?

Well I have a problem with my patcher It starts downloading the files and then stops permanently.I had to reinstall my windows and this is the first time it happened to me.Another thing may be that I do not have some of my old programs.Can I get some help?(Windows 7 ultimate,32 bit).Thank you.P.S:only happened this patch(6.9).

Before patch 6.9, I had a standard of 20-40 ping. But after the updating the patch, I have been stuck at 999+ ping. What is the reason for this issue? I did not update or download anything other than the patch.

When your Ping rises in game its usually a sign that your client isn't connecting to our Servers properly. If you run through this [Connection KB](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) it should lower your ping. If it doesn't though reach back out to me.
I have done all of those and I still have 999+ ping ):

If you send in a [ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)to our tech team we can take a look into what's going on. Make sure to include these logs as well: 

- Network Analysis: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#wq1

- NetworkInfo Log: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#wq4

- Process List: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#wq3

These will give the tech team all the information they need to look into this more for you.
Patcher is no longer loading. The upload speed is 0 KBps and only loaded .33 MB

Hey PacoTheTaco217, 

If you give me a bit more information I  may be able to clear this up with you! What percentage is your Patcher stopping at?
